column4: what are good graphical games to use for testing if the intel drivers insralled ok?
i did whats written herer but how can i test if it is working ok? http://webupd8.blogspot.com/2009/05/reverting-xorg-video-intel-driver-of.html
I use sauerbraten (great game) but for testing glxgears works well
look at /var/log/Xorg.0.log ... first 50 or so lines will show versions
